overview.heading: Moncton Virtual Office
overview.body: Have you been thinking about a Moncton address to either launch your new venture or elevate your existing business? Worry not about the costs of a full-fledged office. Opus VO is your ideal choice. Situate your business at one of our select Moncton locations, and enjoy all the prestige of a sought-after address without the fiscal burden. For those times requiring in-person interactions or crucial client meetings, our high-quality conference rooms are ready and waiting.  But it’s not just about a prime address. When you choose a virtual office at Opus VO in Moncton, you’re also availing yourself of a live receptionist. Rely on our committed team to facilitate your client communications and take care of the day-to-day like handling your digital mail and routing calls, freeing you to zero in on your business growth.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Moncton, New Brunswick even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Moncton. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within New Brunswick.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Moncton virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Moncton? Why Opus VO?
sections.body: Moncton is not merely a charming city; it’s a burgeoning hub of business activities with ample opportunities across a range of sectors. By establishing your virtual office through Opus VO in Moncton, you’re not only minimizing costs; you’re plugging into a vibrant professional community that’s ripe for collaborations and opportunities.  Choosing Opus VO in Moncton is about more than saving on overhead; it’s a strategic step that aligns your business for greater achievements. Your next monumental move could be just a virtual office choice away.  Opus VO Location in Moncton @ 500 St George Street, Moncton, NB E1C 1Y3
